name: Tetrik: Color Block Puzzle
description:
Enjoy the new block puzzle game on the block! Match the colors and don’t let the bricks reach the bottom of the board. Play at your own pace and decide on the best place to drop the blocks in reverse gravity.

Use the boosters and fly past your friends on the Leaderboard while having fun. Already on top in the endless mode? Race to victory in limited time and limited move modes to see if you can take home the win.

Connect three or more same colored bricks to destroy them. Destroy three or more groups with a single move to multiply your points and earn Tetrik gold. Use the Blast, Rubik or Trash when the board gets too crowded. You’ll have 5 of each to help you get started. Don’t worry about running out of boosters, you can always stock up on them with Tetrik gold.


Tetrik features:
-Easy to start, hard to stop game play
-Excellent HD graphics, nice smooth animations
-Extra boosters to help you score higher
-Fun play modes: Limited Time, Limited Move and Endless
-Leaderboards for fun challenges
